mapper.sql: pid, serialNo, billNo, proposalCode, projectCode, projectName, num, medicalPrice, ruleName, deductPrice, deductReason, repaymentReason, doctorName, deptCode, deptName,enterHospitalDateStr,outHospitalDateStr,costDateStr, hospitalizedNo, treatmentMode, settlementDateStr, personalNo, insuredName, cardNumber, areaName, versionNumber, backAppeal, typeno, applyDateStr, id, applyDataId, arDoctorCode, arDoctorName, arDeptCode, arDeptName, operateReason, operateDate, currencyField,dataType,orderNumber,orderNum,relatelDataId,resetDataId,areaType,dksName
mapper.select: SELECT rrd.id resetDataId, rrd.pid, rrd.serialNo, rrd.billNo, rrd.projectCode, rrd.projectName, rrd.medicalPrice, rrd.ruleName, rrd.deductPrice, rrd.deductReason, rrd.repaymentReason, rrd.doctorName, rrd.deptCode, rrd.deptName, rrd.costDate, rrd.costDateStr, rrd.hospitalizedNo, rrd.treatmentMode, rrd.settlementDate, rrd.settlementDateStr, rrd.personalNo, rrd.insuredName, rrd.cardNumber, rrd.areaName, rrd.insuredType, rrd.orderNumber, rrd.seekState, rrd.repaymentPrice, rrd.orderNum, rrd.resetDate, art.typeno, art.applyDateStr, rrd.dataType, art.id, art.applyDataId, art.doctorCode arDoctorCode, art.doctorName arDoctorName, art.deptCode arDeptCode, art.deptName arDeptName, art.operateReason, art.operateDate, '' currencyField, art.relatelDataId, art.areaType, art.dksName FROM yb_reconsider_reset_data rrd LEFT JOIN yb_appeal_result art on art.relatelDataId = rrd.relatelDataId AND art.sourceType = 1 WHERE rrd.pid = #{ybAppealResultResetView.pid}
